by  ELIZABETH COWEN September  

Sara Kripp is a graduate intern for Neighbors in the Strip an organization whose mission is Sara Kripp is a graduate intern for Neighbors in the Strip an organization whose mission is To promote economic development opportunities while preserving the personality integrity and character of the Strip. the Pitt News got a chance to talk to her about the organization and this weekends Strip Fall Crawl PERIOD

What do you believe the Strip District has to offer to college students that is different from bars in say Oakland or the South Side

Well the Strip is known for its clubs mostly dance clubs PERIOD But they also have bars for everyone PERIOD They have a biker bar the Voodoo Lounge you have your cheap drinks at Park House in the Strip you have your more posh crowd at D
